original_text: On the north side their boundary began at the Jordan. Then the boundary goes up to the shoulder north of Jericho, then up through the hill country westward, and it ends at the wilderness of Beth-aven.
korean_text: 그들의 북방 경계는 요단에서부터 여리고 북쪽으로 올라가서 서쪽 산지를 넘어서 또 올라가서 벧아웬 황무지에 이르며

sentences.original_text: On the north side their boundary began at the Jordan.
Then the boundary goes up to the shoulder north of Jericho
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 경계는 여리고 북쪽의 어깨까지 올라갑니다.

sentences.original_text: then up through the hill country westward
and it ends at the wilderness of Beth-aven.
